channel.title: Deathlypvpz help please
channel.description:
guys, i downloaded the amazing source, client and cache from deathlypvpz v4 ;D ;D ;D (topic on mopar : https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,602096.msg4220286.html#msg4220286) and i need some help, i can't find the folder to put my models in, and i even don't now what type of file (.rar, .dat or .mqo) my other problem is that i can't find the file for changing commands like ::home i even don't now how to add shops :| (i now it in 317 servers, not by this one)
so it should be nice to give me some help :)

item.title: Deathlypvpz help please
item.dc:creator: @Adam200214 Adam200214
item.description:
@Adam200214 wrote:

You got skype? I can show you on skype or TeamViewer if so Pm me your skype and i’ll do it for you… it’s not that hard once you get used to it… just includes filling in a few numbers

Read full topic

item.title: Deathlypvpz help please
item.dc:creator: @gotrip gotrip
item.description:
@gotrip wrote:

Adam200214:

Did you put the ints in itemDef.java or item8.java? depending on which 1 you have

i din’t do that, but i don’t now how to do that, can u please explaim me, i am a noob that wanna have some fun on my own rsps
so maybe u could help me, i hope so…

Read full topic

item.title: Deathlypvpz help please
item.dc:creator: @gotrip gotrip
item.description:
@gotrip wrote:

Adam200214:

You should use datmaker or something to make .dat files. remember it has to be called a number, it can’t be called something like “sword”, make it something like “8000”

i did, but theres a problem, there spawned null, again…
please help me…

Read full topic

item.title: Deathlypvpz help please
item.dc:creator: @gotrip gotrip
item.description:
@gotrip wrote:

[quote=“Adam200214, post:2, topic:542807”]models–C:/.deathlypvpzV3(or something)/raw… put the models in here, don’t forget to remember which number you named it.
commands = commands.java
when you say shops, do you mean from scratch, or changing/removing/adding items?[/quote]

ty, and i mean adding shops, like the party pete guy that sales donator stuff…
adding in home

and the models, what type? .rar, .dat or .mqo files??

Read full topic
